channel.title: How do i make a shop for my server if u tell em u get a reward
channel.description: i just made a server i wanna know how 2 make a new shop and put items on that shop wat files do i go 2 ???? if u tell me u will be co owner on my server

item.title: How do i make a shop for my server if u tell em u get a reward
item.dc:creator: @Java5 Java?
item.description:
@Java5 wrote:

On another topic

Theres more to it then that, you need to go to client.java and set the shop id for the npc (i really don’t feel like posting how to do that).

that is the noob slow way and harder. Just get ur autospawn.cfg, put in right coordinates, and then edit shops.cfg…

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a shop for my server if u tell em u get a reward
item.dc:creator: @Java5 Java?
item.description:
@Java5 wrote:

go to shops.cfg (u need textpad) (Right click shops .cfg).

Then press edit with textpad
Now if u wanna change the shop x y position, go into autospawn.cfg and configure the x y coordinates

Read full topic
